title: If I got passing marks in one paper of 12th boards then how much do I have to score for a good percentage or atleast for 75%? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to score the minimum marks of 83 in all this remaining subjects to get the good percentage of at least 75 for which you have to work hard and smart you can also join us on YouTube where we provide educational videos for the motivation for the students who are studying in their college level or at the school level thank you
If you scored passing marks in one of the subjects by scoring atleast 80–85% in other exams you can reach a percentage of 75%. You can score higher in subjects like englsih and your optional subject.
